Paper.Title: A Unified Framework for Automatic Evaluation using N-gram Co-Occurrence Statistics

Section.Paragraph: In this paper we propose a unified framework for automatic evaluation of NLP applications using N-gram co-occurrence statistics. The automatic evaluation metrics proposed to date for Machine Translation and Automatic Summarization are particular instances from the family of metrics we propose.
